game.name: Circularity
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Relaxing puzzle with interesting game mechanics - bring your character to the final portal which will transit you to the next level. You will need to move straight, avoid obstacles, jump through portals, ricochet from walls and a lot more.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Relaxing puzzle with interesting game mechanics - bring your character to the final portal which will transit you to the next level. You will need to move straight, avoid obstacles, jump through portals, ricochet from walls and a lot more.

reviewHighlights.text: A pretty cool game with awesome and interesting puzzles. The game has enough levels to really enjoy it. I recommend giving this game a try!
Circularity tries to pass off repetition as design, offering a "relaxing" experience that's just a slick way of saying it's mildly tedious. The core m...
